summary:
Highly experienced communications and digital media professional, with a focus on producing appealing and creative contents, graphics and out-of-the-box ideas. Creative writer, designer and music producer with multilingual skills (It, En, Sp, Fr, Nl) and a strong background in business management and customer care.

"I pride myself on being a helpful, friendly, motivated and hard working professional with a great affinity for customer care, developed in years of experience within my own companies in Italy. I enthusiastically deal with customers' needs and I strive to exceed their expectations, applying my well-developed communication skills and building positive relationships with them. Job-wise, my main strenght points are my penchant for team work, my ability to work effectively under pressure, to meet tight deadlines and to prioritise and deal effectively with a number of tasks simultaneously."

- Founder and CEO of "Moksha Music", record label in The Netherlands
- Founder and Vice President of "iG", cross media company in Italy
- Founder of "Tek-01", IT company in Italy
- Founder and president of "Club del Gusto Tergeste", cigar club in Italy
- Graphic designer, publisher, web designer
- Music producer
- Lyrics author, songwriter
- Recording studio engineer
- Copywriter
- Video director and editor
- English to Italian professional translator
- Video editor
- Computer technician
- Webmaster and SEO at freddieautograph.com and clubdelgusto.ts.it
- Author of "Sapere Aude", Hip Hop music album
- Author of "Rimostranze", Hip Hop music album
- Producer and executive producer of "Full Melt Jacket", Hip Hop music album
- Author of "Sniffing Coke", award winning video reportage about steel pollution in Trieste
- Author of "I Pugni Fuori", video reportage about riots in Italy and Greece
